// CartContext.js
import React,{createContext,useContext,useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CartContext=/*#__PURE__*/createContext();export const useCart=()=>useContext(CartContext);export const CartProvider=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const[cartItems,setCartItems]=useState([]);const[totalPrice,setTotalPrice]=useState(0);const addToCart=product=>{const updatedCart=[...cartItems,product];setCartItems(updatedCart);const updatedTotalPrice=totalPrice+product.price;setTotalPrice(updatedTotalPrice);};const removeCartItem=productId=>{const updatedCart=cartItems.filter(item=>item.id!==productId);setCartItems(updatedCart);const updatedTotalPrice=updatedCart.reduce((total,item)=>total+item.price,0);setTotalPrice(updatedTotalPrice);};const clearCart=()=>{setCartItems([]);setTotalPrice(0);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CartContext.Provider,{value:{cartItems,totalPrice,addToCart,removeCartItem,clearCart},children:children});};
